translation.cy: blwyddyn academaidd 2019/20 – trosolwg
translation.en: academic year 2019/20 – overview

translation.cy: 1.2	Mae Cynllun Cymhelliant Iaith Athrawon Yfory yn cynnwys grantiau sy'n cymell unigolion cymwys i gwblhau rhaglen AGA ôl-radd uwchradd yng Nghymru sy’n eu galluogi i addysgu drwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg neu addysgu’r Gymraeg fel pwnc ("grantiau hyfforddi").
translation.en: 1.2 	The Iaith Athrawon Yfory Incentive Scheme includes grants by way of incentives to eligible persons who complete a secondary postgraduate ITE programme in Wales that enables them to teach through the medium of Welsh or Welsh as a subject (“training grants”).

translation.cy: Grantiau hyfforddi
translation.en: Training grants

translation.cy: Pwy sy'n gymwys i gael grantiau hyfforddi
translation.en: Eligibility for training grants

translation.cy: Pa grantiau y dylid eu talu
translation.en: What grants should be paid

translation.cy: Caiff y taliad cyntaf o £2,500 ei roi pan gwblheir yn llwyddiannus raglen AGA ôl-radd uwchradd gymwys yng Nghymru sy'n arwain at SAC.
translation.en: The first payment of £2,500 will be paid on successful completion of an eligible secondary postgraduate ITE programme in Wales leading to QTS.

translation.cy: Dim ond os na ohiriwyd eu cwrs am fwy na blwyddyn academaidd y bydd hawlwyr yn parhau i fod yn gymwys am y grant hyfforddi.
translation.en: Claimants will only remain eligible for the training grant if the deferment of their course is no longer than one academic year.

translation.cy: Bydd yn ofynnol i'r unigolion cymwys gyflwyno ffurflen hawlio i Lywodraeth Cymru o fewn blwyddyn i ennill SAC.
translation.en: Eligible persons are required to submit a claim form to the Welsh Government within one year of successfully obtaining QTS.

translation.cy: Dull gwneud taliadau
translation.en: Method of making payments

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd Gweinidogion Cymru yn arfer y pwerau hyn lle:-
translation.en: Cases where these powers might be exercised by the Welsh Ministers will be where:-

translation.cy: Nid yw athrawon sy'n ennill Statws Athro Cymwysedig drwy ddilyn llwybrau ar sail cyflogaeth yn gymwys i gael y grant hyfforddi.
translation.en: Teachers who gain Qualified Teacher Status through employment-based routes are not eligible to receive the training grant.

translation.cy: Gellir hawlio’r taliad cyntaf unwaith y bydd y statws SAC wedi’i dyfarnu.
translation.en: The first instalment may be claimed once QTS is awarded.

translation.cy: ystyr “cyflogedig” (“employed”) yw wedi’i gyflogi o dan gontract cyflogaeth neu wedi’i gyflogi i ddarparu gwasanaethau mewn ffordd arall heblaw o dan gontract cyflogaeth a dylid dehongli “cyflogaeth” (“employment”) yn unol â hynny;
translation.en: “employed” (“cyflogedig”) means employed under a contract of employment or engaged to provide services otherwise than under a contract of employment and “employment” (“cyflogaeth”) shall be construed accordingly;

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru dalu grantiau i unigolion sy’n gymwys i gael grantiau o’r fath o dan y Cynllun hwn o dan y paragraff hwn (“grantiau hyfforddi”) ar ffurf cymhellion i unigolion sy’n bodloni gofynion paragraff  10.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may pay grants to persons who are eligible to receive such grants under the Scheme (“training grants”) by way of incentives to persons who satisfy the requirements of paragraph 10.

translation.cy: I fod yn gymwys i gael grant hyfforddi, rhaid i unigolyn:-
translation.en: To be eligible for this training grant, a person must:-

translation.cy: Mae unigolion sy'n gymwys ar gyfer y cynllun cymhelliant hwn hefyd yn gymwys i hawlio cymhellion eraill ar gyfer hyfforddiant athrawon ar yr amod eu bod yn bodloni meini prawf cymhwysedd y cynlluniau hynny yn y flwyddyn academaidd berthnasol.
translation.en: Eligible persons for this incentive scheme are also entitled to claim other teacher training incentives providing they meet the eligibility criteria of those schemes in the academic year of study.

translation.cy: Y cymhellion sydd ar gael ar hyn o bryd ar gyfer Addysg Gychwynnol Athrawon yw Llywodraeth Cymru  |  Cymhellion hyfforddi athrawon ar gyfer myfyrwyr TAR
translation.en: 5 The Initial Teacher Education incentives currently available are Welsh Government teacher training incentives for PGCE students.

translation.cy: Rhaid cyflwyno ffurflenni hawlio wedi'u cwblhau o fewn blwyddyn i gwblhau cyfnod sefydlu yn llwyddiannus.
translation.en: Completed claim forms to be submitted within one year of successfully completing induction period.

translation.cy: Beth y mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn ei wneud gyda'ch gwybodaeth?
translation.en: What is the Welsh Government doing with your information?

translation.cy: Ni fydd Llywodraeth Cymru ond yn darparu data at ddibenion penodol ac am gyfnod cyfyngedig. Rhaid i'r sefydliad gadarnhau ei fod wedi dinistrio'r data ar ôl y cyfnod cyfyngedig hwnnw.
translation.en: The Welsh Government will only provide data for a specific purpose and for a limited time period, after which the organisation must confirm that it has been destroyed.

translation.cy: Cyflwyno cwyn i'r Comisiynydd Gwybodaeth, sef y rheoleiddiwr annibynnol ar gyfer diogelu data.
translation.en: Lodge a complaint with the Information Commissioner who is the independent regulator for data protection.
